author: right
glottocode: right; irregular loss of initial vowel

author: to walk
glottocode: 'ascend' (e.g. a hill, also used for getting into a canoe or truck)

author: to walk
glottocode: 'descend' (e.g. come down from a tree, a hill)

author: dirty
glottocode: dirty; only found in Lengo and Longgu so it seems like that this results from contact

author: neck
glottocode: neck; irregular addition of initial vowel

author: to breathe
glottocode: breathe; looks like a possible loan from Lengo given the sound correspondences

author: to cook
glottocode: No general term. For boiling food 'kuki' borrowed

author: eye
glottocode: eye; irregular presence of ʔ; likely to be influenced by neighbouring GG languages

author: rope
glottocode: rope; irregular loss of *w; perhaps a loan from Lengo

author: to stab, pierce
glottocode: e.g. the eye of a coconut

author: to pound, beat
glottocode: topuhui - pudding made by pounding tubers e.g. yam
